page.title: 08CLUBS & GROUPS, LACEY GREEN
page.content: MANY CLUBS AND GROUPS ARE BASED AT THE VILLAGE HALLS, LIKE{WOMENS INSTITUTES IN SPEEN AND LACEY GREEN. THE{SPORTS {CLUB}HAS ITS OWN GROUND AND PAVILION IN LACEY GREEN, WITH TENNIS, CRICKET AND FOOTBALL SECTIONS.{WOMEN'S}AND {YOUTH GROUPS}ARE ATTACHED TO THE CHURCHES.{CUBS AND SCOUTS}HAVE THEIR OWN BUILDING BUT THE{NURSERY CLASSES, {PLAY GROUP}AND{TODDLERS CLUB}ARE IN THE VILLAGE HALL AS ARE{KEEP FIT, {YOGA, KARATE AND ARCHERY. A DERBY & {JOAN}CLUB FOR THE ELDERLY MEETS ONCE A MONTH AND THE{HORTICULTURAL SOCIETY MEETS BI-MONTHLY. THE{COMMUNITY CHOIR REHEARSES IN SCHOOL ONCE A WEEK AND {"LACEY GREEN PRODUCTIONS"}HOLDS THEATRE WORKSHOPS IN THE VILLAGE HALL PRODUCING A SHOW AT STOCKEN FARM BARN IN ALTERNATE YEARS. THESE ALL JOIN TO ORGANISE{FETES}OR{"VILLAGE DAYS".
